title: Can You Download on HBO Max? Everything You Need to Know

steps.title: You can download on Max if you have a Standard or Premium plan.
steps.content: You can download on Max if you have a Standard or Premium plan. If you have the Basic with Ads plan, you won't be able to download any shows or movies to your devices. However, if you have the Standard or Premium plans, you can download shows and movies to watch when you're offline. [1] X Research source If you have the Standard plan, you can have up to 30 downloads across all your devices. If you have the Premium plan, you can have up to 100 downloads across your devices. When downloading movies, you can have up to 30 downloaded at a time for both Standard and Premium. Keep in mind that some series may have a limit of 25 download episodes per series at a time.

steps.title: Open the HBO Max app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open the HBO Max app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. You must have at least a Standard plan or Premium plan to download shows and movies for offline viewing. If you have a Basic plan, you won't be able to download anything. It is not possible to download movies or shows on your TV, laptop, or desktop computer. If you aren't already logged into your account, do so now.

steps.title: Search for something to download.
steps.content: Search for something to download. Use the search bar to enter the name of a show or movie, or browse your home screen for something to watch.

steps.title: Select the download icon.
steps.content: Select the download icon. This will be next to the title or episode description. If the content downloads in a different language for subtitles and/or audio, select the play button, and then select your preferred language. Return to the content description screen, and then select the download icon. If you need to cancel a download, select the progress icon, and then select Cancel .

steps.title: Open the HBO Max app on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open the HBO Max app on your phone or tablet. If you aren't already logged into your account, do so now.

steps.title: Tap the download icon.
steps.content: Tap the download icon. If you don't see this icon, tap your profile icon first. You'll see a list of all your downloaded shows and/or movies.

steps.title: Select a movie or show.
steps.content: Select a movie or show. The content will start playing. If you want to delete a download, select the checkmark icon, and then tap Delete Download .

steps.title: Check your storage.
steps.content: Check your storage. If you can't download a movie or show from Max, you may not have enough storage on your phone or tablet. Content from Max cannot be saved onto an SD card. To find your available storage space, do the following in the Max app: Navigate to your profile. Select App Settings . Select Download Settings .

steps.title: Make sure you have the correct plan.
steps.content: Make sure you have the correct plan. If you can't find the download icon for a movie or episode, you may have the Basic plan. You must have the Standard or Premium plan to download content. Additionally, make sure you're using a supported device. Some episodes or movies may be unavailable for download in your region.

steps.title: Restart the HBO Max app.
steps.content: Restart the HBO Max app. If you can't play your download, try force-restarting your app. Then, try again.

steps.title: Check the number of downloads.
steps.content: Check the number of downloads. If you're getting a "Download Limit Reached" error message, you've reached the maximum number of downloads for your plan. If you have Standard, you can download up to 30 items. If you have Premium, you can download up to 100 items (or 30 movies).

steps.title: Can I download HBO Max shows to my laptop?
steps.content: Can I download HBO Max shows to my laptop? No, you can't download shows or movies on a computer, laptop, or TV.

steps.title: What devices can I download on?
steps.content: What devices can I download on? You can download HBO Max shows and movies on the following mobile devices: Apple iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch Android phone and tablet Amazon Fire tablet

steps.title: How do I delete a download?
steps.content: How do I delete a download? To delete a download, select the download icon to see the list of downloaded content. Then, select the checkmark icon next to the download and tap Delete Download .

steps.title: How do I change the download quality?
steps.content: How do I change the download quality? To change the video quality of your downloads, do the following: Navigate to your profile. Select App Settings . Select Download Settings . Select Video Quality . Select a download quality.

steps.title: How do I download over a cellular network?
steps.content: How do I download over a cellular network? If you don't have access to Wi-Fi, you can choose to download using your mobile data. Keep in mind that you may be charged for this data depending on your plan. Do the following: Open the Max app. Select your profile. Select App Settings . Select Download Settings . Toggle off Download Over Wi-Fi Only . Tap the download icon again.

steps.title: Do HBO Max downloads expire?
steps.content: Do HBO Max downloads expire? You have 30 days to watch a download before it expires and is removed from your downloads. If you begin the content, you have 48 hours to finish watching it before it expires. If a download expires, you can easily renew it by tapping the downloads icon, selecting the expired download icon, and then tapping Renew Download .
